title: Increased G causes movement left along SRPC

content.question: Which of the following would cause a movement from point S to point R on the short-run Phillips curve above?

choices.label: An unanticipated increase in government spending
An increase in real interest rates
An increase in the labor-force participation rate

content.answer: An unanticipated increase in government spending
